translations: n.（简陋的）小屋；（花园中的）木屋，（建筑工人等住的）临时工棚

sentences.sentence: The little prefabricated hut was lifted away by a huge crane.
sentences.translation: 那间小小的预制棚屋被一台巨大的起重机吊走了。

sentences.sentence: You haven't lived till you've learned how to yodel at a tea dance in a mountain hut!
sentences.translation: 你要是还未学会在山间小屋的下午茶舞会上用约德尔调歌唱的话，那你就白活了！

sentences.sentence: Heidi just now came out of the hut.
